short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch YouTube video's flawlessly, It skips skippable ads for you and also disable YouTube video auto-pause.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can use this app for blocking ads, Auto skips YouTube ads (only skippable ads), Disable YouTube auto pause & also have an easy access tab list, where you can add or remove tabs.
